name: Manoir De La Tour

reviews.text: We stayed at this small hotel in Quebec City for 3 nights. It has a B&B touch, with very friendly staff, home-style decor, and other nice things. It is in a great location over a main avenue, a few steps from one of the most important parks, a few blocks from Cartier street where there are plenty of nice places to eat with locals, and walking distance from the Parliament and one of the main gates to the Old Quebec.
reviews.title: Great location, clean, friendly

likes.disliked: — Small TV with no remote-control, no Internet access from rooms

aka: Manoir De La Tour Quebec/Quebec City
